verses.verse: תְּהִלָּ֗ה <WH8416> te-hil-Lah, [Psalm] of praise לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid David's אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ <WH7311> a-ro-mi-Cha I will extol אֱלוֹהַ֣י <WH433> e-lo-Hai God הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech; O king וַאֲבָרֲכָ֥ה <WH1288> va-'a-va-ra-Chah and I will bless שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> me-Cha, thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> va-'Ed. and ever

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol Every י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom Every day אֲבָרֲכֶ֑ךָּ <WH1288> 'a-va-ra-Che-ka; will I bless וַאֲהַלְלָ֥ה <WH1984> va-'a-hal-Lah thee and I will praise שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> me-Cha, thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> va-'Ed. and ever

גָּ֘ד֤וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol Great יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <WH1984> u-me-hul-Lal to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; and greatly וְ֝לִגְדֻלָּת֗וֹ <WH1420> ve-lig-dul-la-To, and his greatness אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein else חֵֽקֶר׃ <WH2714> Che-ker. [is] unsearchable

דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> Dor One לְ֭דוֹר <WH1755> Le-dor generation יְשַׁבַּ֣ח <WH7623> ye-shab-Bach shall praise מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-cha; thy works וּגְב֖וּרֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH1369> u-ge-Vu-ro-Tei-cha thy mighty acts יַגִּֽידוּ׃ <WH5046> yag-Gi-du. to another and shall declare

הֲ֭דַר <WH1926> Ha-dar honour כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod of the glorious הוֹדֶ֑ךָ <WH1935> ho-De-cha; of thy majesty וְדִבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> ve-div-Rei works נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha and of thy wondrous אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <WH7878> 'a-Si-chah. I will speak

וֶעֱז֣וּז <WH5807> ve-'e-Zuz of the might נוֹרְאֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH3372> nor-'o-Tei-cha of thy terrible acts יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <WH559> yo-Me-ru; And [men] shall speak; וּגְדוּלֹּתֶיךָ u-ge-dul-lo-tei-cha כוּגְדוּלָּתְךָ֥ <WH1420> u-ge-dul-la-te-Cha dignity קאֲסַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5608> 'a-sap-pe-Ren-nah. and I will declare

זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> Ze-cher the memory רַב־ <WH7227> rav- of thy great טוּבְךָ֣ <WH2898> tu-ve-Cha goodness יַבִּ֑יעוּ <WH5042> yab-Bi-'u; They shall abundantly utter וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha of thy righteousness יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> ye-ran-Ne-nu. and shall sing

חַנּ֣וּן <WH2587> chan-Nun [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> ve-ra-Chum and full of compassion יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; The LORD אֶ֥רֶךְ <WH750> 'E-rech slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <WH639> 'ap-Pa-yim, to anger וּגְדָל־ <WH1419> u-ge-dol- and of great חָֽסֶד׃ <WH2617> Cha-sed. mercy

טוֹב־ <WH2896> tov- [is] good יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לַכֹּ֑ל <WH3605> lak-Kol; to all וְ֝רַחֲמָ֗יו <WH7356> ve-ra-cha-Mav, to all and his tender mercies עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- are over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sav. [are] over all his works

יוֹד֣וּךָ <WH3034> yo-Du-cha shall praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh thee O LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-cha; All thy works וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <WH2623> va-cha-si-Dei-cha, and thy saints יְבָרֲכֽוּכָה׃ <WH1288> ye-va-ra-Chu-chah. shall bless

כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod of the glory מַלְכוּתְךָ֣ <WH4438> mal-chu-te-Cha of thy kingdom יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <WH559> yo-Me-ru; They shall speak וּגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ <WH1369> u-ge-vu-ra-te-Cha of thy power יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH1696> ye-dab-Be-ru. and talk

לְהוֹדִ֤יעַ׀ <WH3045> le-ho-Di-a' To make known לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei to the sons הָ֭אָדָם <WH120> Ha-'a-dom of men גְּבוּרֹתָ֑יו <WH1369> ge-vu-ro-Tav; his mighty acts וּ֝כְב֗וֹד <WH3519> u-che-Vod, and the glorious הֲדַ֣ר <WH1926> ha-Dar majesty מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4438> mal-chu-To. of his kingdom

מַֽלְכוּתְךָ֗ <WH4438> mal-chu-te-Cha, Thy kingdom מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> mal-Chut kingdom כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֹֽלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> 'o-la-Mim; [is] an everlasting וּ֝מֶֽמְשֶׁלְתְּךָ֗ <WH4475> u-mem-shel-te-cha, and thy dominion בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> Dor [endureth] throughout all וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> va-Dor. generations

סוֹמֵ֣ךְ <WH5564> so-Mech upholdeth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הַנֹּפְלִ֑ים <WH5307> han-no-fe-Lim; all that fall וְ֝זוֹקֵ֗ף <WH2210> ve-zo-Kef, and raiseth up לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הַכְּפוּפִֽים׃ <WH3721> hak-ke-fu-Fim. all [those that be] bowed down

עֵֽינֵי־ <WH5869> 'ei-nei- The eyes כֹ֭ל <WH3605> chol of all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about יְשַׂבֵּ֑רוּ <WH7663> ye-sab-Be-ru; of all wait וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah and You נֽוֹתֵן־ <WH5414> no-ten- upon thee and thou givest לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> la-Hem like אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָכְלָ֣ם <WH400> 'a-che-Lam them their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6256> be-'it-To. in due season

פּוֹתֵ֥חַ <WH6605> po-Te-ach Thou openest אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> ya-De-cha; thine hand וּמַשְׂבִּ֖יעַ <WH7646> u-mas-Bi-a' and satisfiest לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol of every חַ֣י <WH2416> chai of every living thing רָצֽוֹן׃ <WH7522> ra-Tzon. the desire

צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik [is] righteous יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all דְּרָכָ֑יו <WH1870> de-ra-Chav; in all his ways וְ֝חָסִ֗יד <WH2623> ve-cha-Sid, and holy בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sav. in all his works

קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> ka-Rov [is] nigh יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all קֹרְאָ֑יו <WH7121> ko-re-'Av; unto all them that call לְכֹ֤ל <WH3605> le-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יִקְרָאֻ֣הוּ <WH7121> yik-ra-'U-hu upon him to all that call בֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> ve-'e-Met. upon him in truth

רְצוֹן־ <WH7522> re-tzon- the desire יְרֵאָ֥יו <WH3373> ye-re-'Av of them that fear יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh; He will fulfil וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁוְעָתָ֥ם <WH7775> shav-'a-Tam their cry יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> yish-Ma', him he also will hear וְיוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <WH3467> ve-yo-shi-'Em. and will save

שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> sho-Mer preserveth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֹהֲבָ֑יו <WH157> 'o-ha-Vav; all them that love וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָרְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> ha-re-sha-'Im him but all the wicked יַשְׁמִֽיד׃ <WH8045> yash-Mid. will he destroy

תְּהִלַּ֥ת <WH8416> te-hil-Lat the praise יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD יְֽדַבֶּ֫ר־ <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber- shall speak פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi My mouth וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> vi-va-Rech bless כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all בָּ֭שָׂר <WH1320> Ba-sor and let all flesh שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> shem name קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho, his holy לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> va-'Ed. and ever
